mapper.select: select a.eid,b.did,b.name,b.comment,b.dtype_id,b.created,b.updated from ncs_exercise a, ncs_drill b where a.course_id=#{cid} and a.drill_id=b.did order by b.name
select max(created) from ncs_exercise where course_id=#{cid}
mapper.update: update ncs_exercise set course_id=#{cid},drill_id=#{did} where eid=#{eid}
